comments: Period 8.Terms of the simple continued fraction of 678982/(sqrt(10997122748477)-2846611). - _Paolo P. Lava_, Aug 06 2009
references: I. M. Vinogradov, Elements of Number Theory, pp. 220 ff.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,0,-1,1)
prog: (PARI) { for (n=0, 1000, write("b062116.txt", n, " ", 2^n%17) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 01 2009(Sage) [power_mod(2,n,17) for n in xrange(0,87)] # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Nov 03 2009
